name: CarTag (bietlxn)
description:
NOTE: THE GAME IS NOT COMPLETE AND HAS MANY FLAWS

A game I made because I wanted to learn how to make car physics.

This game is paid as it's not a game I was meaning to publish, but if you really want to support me, you can buy this. It has no real value and is just a car controller I made. The mouse controls are really broken. 

Overall, I'm really proud of this. So for the people that buy this, thank you.

Credits:

Zachary Petersen for the Flexible Cel Shader asset

Bear Interactive for the STYLIZED: Free Drift Car asset
